text: 11:25-26 Matyu 5:23; 6:14-15; Kolosi 3:13Egh nɨ tugh God ko mɨkɨm egh osɨmtɨzim tinan iti, nɨ an arazir kuram gɨn amadagh, eghtɨ kamaghɨn nɨn Afeziar Ekiar uan nguibamɨn itim, nɨn arazir kuraba gɨn amadagham.”11:25-26 Fofozir gumazir maba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir mam uaghan vezɨn kamɨn aven iti. Mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamra kara, “Egh ia gumazamizir igharaziba, ia gamizir arazir kuraba gɨn amadaghan koghtɨ, ian Afeziar uan nguibamɨn itim a uaghan ian arazir kuraba gɨn amadaghan kogham.”
